update() - Method in class camera.OrthoCamera
 
update() - Method in class entity.Enemy

update() - Method in class entity.Entity
 
update() - Method in class entity.EntityManager
Update all entities, remove those missiles that have gone out of bounds
update() - Method in class entity.Missile
Updates the position of the missile.
update() - Method in class entity.Player
Updates the Player object, changes position based on direction, and direction based on whether a key is pressed or not, and shoots a new Missile object if enough time has passed before the last shot.
update() - Method in class screen.GameOverScreen
 
update() - Method in class screen.GameScreen
Updates the camera, and calls the update of the EntityManager to update all entities.
update() - Method in class screen.Screen
 
updateViewport() - Method in class camera.OrthoCamera
This must be called in ApplicationListener.resize() in order to correctly update the camera viewport.
